Token.Abstract: Downloads the given Resource ID into a local NSData object

Parameter.Name: resourceId
Parameter.Abstract: The Resource ID to download.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block called when the operation completes or fails

Parameter.Name: progressBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block called 0+ times while the operation is in progress

Token.Abstract: Downloads the given Resource ID into a local file.

Parameter.Name: resourceId
Parameter.Abstract: The Resource ID to download.

Parameter.Name: filename
Parameter.Abstract: The filename that the resource will use as the download location. This will be set in the KCSResourceResponse that the delegate receives.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block called when the operation completes or fails

Parameter.Name: progressBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block called 0+ times while the operation is in progress

Token.Abstract: Obtain a 30-second time-limited URL for streaming a resource stored on Kinvey.

Parameter.Name: resourceId
Parameter.Abstract: The Resource ID to stream

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block called when the operation completes or fails

Parameter.Name: progressBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block is NEVER called, so just supply nil.

Token.Abstract: Saves the given File to Kinvey.

Parameter.Name: filename
Parameter.Abstract: The filename of the local file to upload.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block called when the operation completes or fails

Parameter.Name: progressBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block called 0+ times while the operation is in progress

Token.Abstract: Saves the given URL to Kinvey.

Parameter.Name: URL
Parameter.Abstract: The file URL of the local file to upload.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block called when the operation completes or fails

Parameter.Name: progressBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block called 0+ times while the operation is in progress

Token.Abstract: Saves the given File into the specified resource.

Parameter.Name: filename
Parameter.Abstract: The filename of the local file to upload.

Parameter.Name: resourceId
Parameter.Abstract: The resource ID to use for remote storage

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block called when the operation completes or fails

Parameter.Name: progressBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block called 0+ times while the operation is in progress

Token.Abstract: Saves the given URL into the specified resource.

Parameter.Name: URL
Parameter.Abstract: The URL of the local file to upload.

Parameter.Name: resourceId
Parameter.Abstract: The resource ID to use for remote storage

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block called when the operation completes or fails

Parameter.Name: progressBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block called 0+ times while the operation is in progress

Token.Abstract: Saves the given Data into the specified resource.

Parameter.Name: data
Parameter.Abstract: The Data to upload to Kinvey.

Parameter.Name: resourceId
Parameter.Abstract: The resource ID to use for remote storage

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block called when the operation completes or fails

Parameter.Name: progressBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block called 0+ times while the operation is in progress

Token.Abstract: Delete the given resource from Kinvey.

Parameter.Name: resourceId
Parameter.Abstract: The resource ID that should be removed.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block called when the operation completes or fails

Parameter.Name: progressBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block called 0+ times while the operation is in progress
